entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 34 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 52 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
